description: Create a basic NMOS transistor with 1μm channel length, 10μm width, operating at 3V supply voltage with silicon substrate and silicon dioxide gate insulator. Include basic DC characteristics analysis.
generated_code:
go atlas

# Adaptive mesh for L=10.0u, W=1.0u NMOS
mesh space.mult=1.0
x.mesh l=-5.000 spac=0.0100
x.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=10.000 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=15.000 spac=0.0100
y.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.0010
y.mesh l=0.01 spac=0.002
y.mesh l=0.1 spac=0.01
y.mesh l=0.5 spac=0.05

# Material regions
region num=1 material=silicon x.min=-5.000 x.max=15.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.5
region num=2 material=oxide x.min=0.0 x.max=10.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0100

# Electrodes
electrode num=1 name=source x.min=-5.000 x.max=0.0 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=2 name=drain x.min=10.000 x.max=15.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=3 name=gate x.min=0.0 x.max=10.000 y.min=0.0100 y.max=0.0100

# Doping profiles
doping uniform p.type conc=1e15 region=1

# Source/drain regions
doping gaussian n.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=-5.000 x.max=0.0
doping gaussian n.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=10.000 x.max=15.000

# Physical models
models srh auger fermi

# Initial solution
solve initial

# Id-Vg curve extraction
solve vdrain=0.1 vgate=-1.0 initial
log outf=idvg_nmos_10.0u.log
solve vgate=3.0 vstep=0.1 name=gate
save outf=nmos_10.0u_idvg.str

tonyplot idvg_nmos_10.0u.log

quit

description: Design a PMOS device with 0.5μm gate length, 20μm width, 1.8V supply, with body bias of -0.5V. Perform transient analysis with 1ns time steps for 100ns duration.
generated_code:
go atlas

# Adaptive mesh for L=20.0u, W=1.0n PMOS
mesh space.mult=1.0
x.mesh l=-10.000 spac=0.0100
x.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=20.000 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=30.000 spac=0.0100
y.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.0010
y.mesh l=0.01 spac=0.002
y.mesh l=0.1 spac=0.01
y.mesh l=0.5 spac=0.05

# Material regions
region num=1 material=silicon x.min=-10.000 x.max=30.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.5
region num=2 material=oxide x.min=0.0 x.max=20.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0100

# Electrodes
electrode num=1 name=source x.min=-10.000 x.max=0.0 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=2 name=drain x.min=20.000 x.max=30.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=3 name=gate x.min=0.0 x.max=20.000 y.min=0.0100 y.max=0.0100

# Doping profiles
doping uniform n.type conc=1e15 region=1

# Source/drain regions
doping gaussian p.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=-10.000 x.max=0.0
doping gaussian p.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=20.000 x.max=30.000

# Physical models
models srh auger fermi

# Initial solution
solve initial

# Id-Vg curve extraction
solve vdrain=-0.1 vgate=1.0 initial
log outf=idvg_pmos_20.0u.log
solve vgate=-3.0 vstep=-0.1 name=gate
save outf=pmos_20.0u_idvg.str

tonyplot idvg_pmos_20.0u.log

quit

description: Create a short-channel NMOS with 45nm gate length, 2μm width, high-k dielectric (HfO2), strain engineering, and 1V operating voltage. Include small-signal AC analysis from 1Hz to 1GHz.
generated_code:
go atlas

# Adaptive mesh for L=2.0u, W=45.0n NMOS
mesh space.mult=1.0
x.mesh l=-1.000 spac=0.0100
x.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=2.000 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=3.000 spac=0.0100
y.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.0010
y.mesh l=0.01 spac=0.002
y.mesh l=0.1 spac=0.01
y.mesh l=0.5 spac=0.05

# Material regions
region num=1 material=silicon x.min=-1.000 x.max=3.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.5
region num=2 material=oxide x.min=0.0 x.max=2.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0100

# Electrodes
electrode num=1 name=source x.min=-1.000 x.max=0.0 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=2 name=drain x.min=2.000 x.max=3.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=3 name=gate x.min=0.0 x.max=2.000 y.min=0.0100 y.max=0.0100

# Doping profiles
doping uniform p.type conc=1e15 region=1

# Source/drain regions
doping gaussian n.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=-1.000 x.max=0.0
doping gaussian n.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=2.000 x.max=3.000

# Physical models
models srh auger fermi

# Initial solution
solve initial

# Id-Vg curve extraction
solve vdrain=0.1 vgate=-1.0 initial
log outf=idvg_nmos_2.0u.log
solve vgate=3.0 vstep=0.1 name=gate
save outf=nmos_2.0u_idvg.str

tonyplot idvg_nmos_2.0u.log

quit

description: Design a power MOSFET with 10μm channel length, 1000μm width, 20V drain voltage capability, and thick gate oxide (50nm). Analyze breakdown characteristics and safe operating area.
generated_code:
go atlas

# Adaptive mesh for L=1000.0u, W=50.0n NMOS
mesh space.mult=1.0
x.mesh l=-500.000 spac=0.0100
x.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=1000.000 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=1500.000 spac=0.0100
y.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.0010
y.mesh l=0.01 spac=0.002
y.mesh l=0.1 spac=0.01
y.mesh l=0.5 spac=0.05

# Material regions
region num=1 material=silicon x.min=-500.000 x.max=1500.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.5
region num=2 material=oxide x.min=0.0 x.max=1000.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0100

# Electrodes
electrode num=1 name=source x.min=-500.000 x.max=0.0 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=2 name=drain x.min=1000.000 x.max=1500.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=3 name=gate x.min=0.0 x.max=1000.000 y.min=0.0100 y.max=0.0100

# Doping profiles
doping uniform p.type conc=1e15 region=1

# Source/drain regions
doping gaussian n.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=-500.000 x.max=0.0
doping gaussian n.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=1000.000 x.max=1500.000

# Physical models
models srh auger fermi

# Initial solution
solve initial

# Id-Vd curve extraction
solve vgate=1.0 vdrain=0.0 initial  
log outf=idvd_nmos_1000.0u.log
solve vdrain=3.0 vstep=0.1 name=drain
save outf=nmos_1000.0u_idvd.str

tonyplot idvd_nmos_1000.0u.log

quit

description: Create a FinFET structure with 14nm technology node, tri-gate configuration, 0.8V supply voltage, and undoped channel. Perform noise analysis and mobility characterization.
generated_code:
go atlas

# Adaptive mesh for L=1u, W=10u NMOS
mesh space.mult=1.0
x.mesh l=-0.500 spac=0.0100
x.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=1.000 spac=0.00200
x.mesh l=1.500 spac=0.0100
y.mesh l=0.0 spac=0.0010
y.mesh l=0.01 spac=0.002
y.mesh l=0.1 spac=0.01
y.mesh l=0.5 spac=0.05

# Material regions
region num=1 material=silicon x.min=-0.500 x.max=1.500 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.5
region num=2 material=oxide x.min=0.0 x.max=1.000 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0100

# Electrodes
electrode num=1 name=source x.min=-0.500 x.max=0.0 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=2 name=drain x.min=1.000 x.max=1.500 y.min=0.0 y.max=0.0
electrode num=3 name=gate x.min=0.0 x.max=1.000 y.min=0.0100 y.max=0.0100

# Doping profiles
doping uniform p.type conc=1e15 region=1

# Source/drain regions
doping gaussian n.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=-0.500 x.max=0.0
doping gaussian n.type conc=1e17 char.length=0.05 x.min=1.000 x.max=1.500

# Physical models
models srh auger fermi

# Initial solution
solve initial

# Id-Vg curve extraction
solve vdrain=0.1 vgate=-1.0 initial
log outf=idvg_nmos_1u.log
solve vgate=3.0 vstep=0.1 name=gate
save outf=nmos_1u_idvg.str

tonyplot idvg_nmos_1u.log

quit
